verses.text: O ye \w children|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Benjamin|strong="H1144"\w*, gather yourselves to \w flee|strong="H5756"\w* out of the \w midst|strong="H7130"\w* of \w Jerusalem|strong="H3389"\w*, and \w blow|strong="H8628"\w* the \w trumpet|strong="H7782"\w* in \w Tekoa|strong="H8620"\w*, and set \w up|strong="H5375"\w* a \w sign|strong="H4864"\w* of fire in \w Beth-haccerem|strong="H1021"\w*: for \w evil|strong="H7451"\w* \w appeareth|strong="H8259"\w* out of the \w north|strong="H6828"\w*, and \w great|strong="H1419"\w* \w destruction|strong="H7667"\w*.

I have \w likened|strong="H1820"\w* the \w daughter|strong="H1323"\w* of \w Zion|strong="H6726"\w* to a \w comely|strong="H5116"\w* and \w delicate|strong="H6026"\w* \add woman\add*.\f + \fr 6.2 \ft comely: or, dwelling at home\f*

The \w shepherds|strong="H7462"\w* with their \w flocks|strong="H5739"\w* shall \w come|strong="H0935"\w* unto her; they shall \w pitch|strong="H8628"\w* \add their\add* \w tents|strong="H0168"\w* against her round \w about|strong="H5439"\w*; they shall \w feed|strong="H7462"\w* every \w one|strong="H0376"\w* in his \w place|strong="H3027"\w*.

\w Prepare|strong="H6942"\w* ye \w war|strong="H4421"\w* against her; \w arise|strong="H6965"\w*, and let us go \w up|strong="H5927"\w* at \w noon|strong="H6672"\w*. \w Woe|strong="H0188"\w* unto us! for the \w day|strong="H3117"\w* goeth \w away|strong="H6437"\w*, for the \w shadows|strong="H6752"\w* of the \w evening|strong="H6153"\w* are stretched \w out|strong="H5186"\w*.
\w Arise|strong="H6965"\w*, and let us \w go|strong="H5927"\w* by \w night|strong="H3915"\w*, and let us \w destroy|strong="H7843"\w* her \w palaces|strong="H0759"\w*.

¶ For thus hath the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* of \w hosts|strong="H6635"\w* \w said|strong="H0559"\w*, Hew ye \w down|strong="H3772"\w* \w trees|strong="H6097"\w*, and \w cast|strong="H8210"\w* a \w mount|strong="H5550"\w* against \w Jerusalem|strong="H3389"\w*: this \add is\add* the \w city|strong="H5892"\w* to be \w visited|strong="H6485"\w*; she \add is\add* wholly \w oppression|strong="H6233"\w* in the \w midst|strong="H7130"\w* of her.\f + \fr 6.6 \ft cast…: or, pour out the engine of shot\f*

As a \w fountain|strong="H0953"\w* casteth \w out|strong="H6979"\w* her \w waters|strong="H4325"\w*, so she casteth \w out|strong="H6979"\w* her \w wickedness|strong="H7451"\w*: \w violence|strong="H2555"\w* and \w spoil|strong="H7701"\w* is \w heard|strong="H8085"\w* in her; before \w me|strong="H6440"\w* \w continually|strong="H8548"\w* \add is\add* \w grief|strong="H2483"\w* and \w wounds|strong="H4347"\w*.

Be thou \w instructed|strong="H3256"\w*, O \w Jerusalem|strong="H3389"\w*, lest my \w soul|strong="H5315"\w* \w depart|strong="H3363"\w* from thee; lest I \w make|strong="H7760"\w* thee \w desolate|strong="H8077"\w*, a \w land|strong="H0776"\w* not \w inhabited|strong="H3427"\w*.\f + \fr 6.8 \ft depart: Heb. be loosed, or, disjointed\f*

¶ Thus \w saith|strong="H0559"\w* the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* of \w hosts|strong="H6635"\w*, They shall \w throughly|strong="H5953"\w* \w glean|strong="H5953"\w* the \w remnant|strong="H7611"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* as a \w vine|strong="H1612"\w*: turn \w back|strong="H7725"\w* thine \w hand|strong="H3027"\w* as a \w grapegatherer|strong="H1219"\w* into the \w baskets|strong="H5552"\w*.

To whom shall I \w speak|strong="H1696"\w*, and give \w warning|strong="H5749"\w*, that they may \w hear|strong="H8085"\w*? behold, their \w ear|strong="H0241"\w* \add is\add* \w uncircumcised|strong="H6189"\w*, and they \w cannot|strong="H3201"\w* \w hearken|strong="H7181"\w*: behold, the \w word|strong="H1697"\w* of the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* is unto them a \w reproach|strong="H2781"\w*; they have no \w delight|strong="H2654"\w* in it.

Therefore I am \w full|strong="H4392"\w* of the \w fury|strong="H2534"\w* of the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*; I am \w weary|strong="H3811"\w* with holding \w in|strong="H3557"\w*: I will pour it \w out|strong="H8210"\w* upon the \w children|strong="H5768"\w* \w abroad|strong="H2351"\w*, and upon the \w assembly|strong="H5475"\w* of young \w men|strong="H0970"\w* \w together|strong="H3162"\w*: for even the \w husband|strong="H0376"\w* with the \w wife|strong="H0802"\w* shall be \w taken|strong="H3920"\w*, the \w aged|strong="H2205"\w* with \add him that is\add* \w full|strong="H4390"\w* of \w days|strong="H3117"\w*.

And their \w houses|strong="H1004"\w* shall be \w turned|strong="H5437"\w* unto \w others|strong="H0312"\w*, \add with their\add* \w fields|strong="H7704"\w* and \w wives|strong="H0802"\w* \w together|strong="H3162"\w*: for I will stretch \w out|strong="H5186"\w* my \w hand|strong="H3027"\w* upon the \w inhabitants|strong="H3427"\w* of the \w land|strong="H0776"\w*, \w saith|strong="H5002"\w* the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*.

For from the \w least|strong="H6996"\w* of them even unto the \w greatest|strong="H1419"\w* of them every one \add is\add* \w given|strong="H1214"\w* to \w covetousness|strong="H1215"\w*; and from the \w prophet|strong="H5030"\w* even unto the \w priest|strong="H3548"\w* every one \w dealeth|strong="H6213"\w* \w falsely|strong="H8267"\w*.

They have \w healed|strong="H7495"\w* also the \w hurt|strong="H7667"\w* \add  \+w of the daughter|strong="H1323"\+w*\add* of my \w people|strong="H5971"\w* \w slightly|strong="H7043"\w*, \w saying|strong="H0559"\w*, \w Peace|strong="H7965"\w*, \w peace|strong="H7965"\w*; when \add there is\add* no \w peace|strong="H7965"\w*.\f + \fr 6.14 \ft hurt: Heb. bruise, or, breach\f*

Were they \w ashamed|strong="H3001"\w* when they had \w committed|strong="H6213"\w* \w abomination|strong="H8441"\w*? \w nay|strong="H1571"\w*, they were not at \w all|strong="H0954"\w* \w ashamed|strong="H0954"\w*, \w neither|strong="H1571"\w* \w could|strong="H3045"\w* they \w blush|strong="H3637"\w*: therefore they shall \w fall|strong="H5307"\w* among them that \w fall|strong="H5307"\w*: at the \w time|strong="H6256"\w* \add that\add* I \w visit|strong="H6485"\w* them they shall be cast \w down|strong="H3782"\w*, \w saith|strong="H0559"\w* the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*.

Thus \w saith|strong="H0559"\w* the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*, \w Stand|strong="H5975"\w* ye in the \w ways|strong="H1870"\w*, and \w see|strong="H7200"\w*, and \w ask|strong="H7592"\w* for the \w old|strong="H5769"\w* \w paths|strong="H5410"\w*, where \add is\add* the \w good|strong="H2896"\w* \w way|strong="H1870"\w*, and \w walk|strong="H3212"\w* therein, and ye shall \w find|strong="H4672"\w* \w rest|strong="H4771"\w* for your \w souls|strong="H5315"\w*. But they \w said|strong="H0559"\w*, We will not \w walk|strong="H3212"\w* \add therein\add*.

Also I \w set|strong="H6965"\w* \w watchmen|strong="H6822"\w* over you, \add saying\add*, \w Hearken|strong="H7181"\w* to the \w sound|strong="H6963"\w* of the \w trumpet|strong="H7782"\w*. But they \w said|strong="H0559"\w*, We will not \w hearken|strong="H7181"\w*.
¶ Therefore \w hear|strong="H8085"\w*, ye \w nations|strong="H1471"\w*, and \w know|strong="H3045"\w*, O \w congregation|strong="H5712"\w*, what \add is\add* among them.

\w Hear|strong="H8085"\w*, O \w earth|strong="H0776"\w*: behold, I will \w bring|strong="H0935"\w* \w evil|strong="H7451"\w* upon this \w people|strong="H5971"\w*, \add even\add* the \w fruit|strong="H6529"\w* of their \w thoughts|strong="H4284"\w*, because they have not \w hearkened|strong="H7181"\w* unto my \w words|strong="H1697"\w*, nor to my \w law|strong="H8451"\w*, but \w rejected|strong="H3988"\w* it.

To what purpose \w cometh|strong="H0935"\w* there to me \w incense|strong="H3828"\w* from \w Sheba|strong="H7614"\w*, and the \w sweet|strong="H2896"\w* \w cane|strong="H7070"\w* from a \w far|strong="H4801"\w* \w country|strong="H0776"\w*? your burnt \w offerings|strong="H5930"\w* \add are\add* not \w acceptable|strong="H7522"\w*, nor your \w sacrifices|strong="H2077"\w* \w sweet|strong="H6149"\w* unto me.

Therefore thus \w saith|strong="H0559"\w* the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*, Behold, I will \w lay|strong="H5414"\w* \w stumblingblocks|strong="H4383"\w* before this \w people|strong="H5971"\w*, and the \w fathers|strong="H0001"\w* and the \w sons|strong="H1121"\w* \w together|strong="H3162"\w* shall \w fall|strong="H3782"\w* upon them; the \w neighbour|strong="H7934"\w* and his \w friend|strong="H7453"\w* shall \w perish|strong="H0006"\w*.

Thus \w saith|strong="H0559"\w* the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*, Behold, a \w people|strong="H5971"\w* \w cometh|strong="H0935"\w* from the \w north|strong="H6828"\w* \w country|strong="H0776"\w*, and a \w great|strong="H1419"\w* \w nation|strong="H1471"\w* shall be \w raised|strong="H5782"\w* from the \w sides|strong="H3411"\w* of the \w earth|strong="H0776"\w*.

They shall lay \w hold|strong="H2388"\w* on \w bow|strong="H7198"\w* and \w spear|strong="H3591"\w*; they \add are\add* \w cruel|strong="H0394"\w*, and have no \w mercy|strong="H7355"\w*; their \w voice|strong="H6963"\w* \w roareth|strong="H1993"\w* like the \w sea|strong="H3220"\w*; and they \w ride|strong="H7392"\w* upon \w horses|strong="H5483"\w*, set in \w array|strong="H6186"\w* as \w men|strong="H0376"\w* for \w war|strong="H4421"\w* against thee, O \w daughter|strong="H1323"\w* of \w Zion|strong="H6726"\w*.

We have \w heard|strong="H8085"\w* the \w fame|strong="H8089"\w* thereof: our \w hands|strong="H3027"\w* wax \w feeble|strong="H7503"\w*: \w anguish|strong="H6869"\w* hath taken \w hold|strong="H2388"\w* of us, \add and\add* \w pain|strong="H2427"\w*, as of a woman in \w travail|strong="H3205"\w*.

Go not \w forth|strong="H3318"\w* into the \w field|strong="H7704"\w*, nor \w walk|strong="H3212"\w* by the \w way|strong="H1870"\w*; for the \w sword|strong="H2719"\w* of the \w enemy|strong="H0341"\w* \add and\add* \w fear|strong="H4032"\w* \add is\add* on every \w side|strong="H5439"\w*.

¶ O \w daughter|strong="H1323"\w* of my \w people|strong="H5971"\w*, \w gird|strong="H2296"\w* \add thee\add* with \w sackcloth|strong="H8242"\w*, and \w wallow|strong="H6428"\w* thyself in \w ashes|strong="H0665"\w*: \w make|strong="H6213"\w* thee \w mourning|strong="H0060"\w*, \add as for\add* an only \w son|strong="H3173"\w*, most \w bitter|strong="H8563"\w* \w lamentation|strong="H4553"\w*: for the \w spoiler|strong="H7703"\w* shall \w suddenly|strong="H6597"\w* \w come|strong="H0935"\w* upon us.

I have \w set|strong="H5414"\w* thee \add for\add* a \w tower|strong="H0969"\w* \add and\add* a \w fortress|strong="H4013"\w* among my \w people|strong="H5971"\w*, that thou mayest \w know|strong="H3045"\w* and \w try|strong="H0974"\w* their \w way|strong="H1870"\w*.

They \add are\add* all \w grievous|strong="H5493"\w* \w revolters|strong="H5637"\w*, \w walking|strong="H1980"\w* with \w slanders|strong="H7400"\w*: \add they are\add* \w brass|strong="H5178"\w* and \w iron|strong="H1270"\w*; they \add are\add* all \w corrupters|strong="H7843"\w*.

The \w bellows|strong="H4647"\w* are \w burned|strong="H2787"\w*, the \w lead|strong="H5777"\w* is \w consumed|strong="H8552"\w* of the \w fire|strong="H0800"\w*; the \w founder|strong="H6884"\w* \w melteth|strong="H6884"\w* in \w vain|strong="H7723"\w*: for the \w wicked|strong="H7451"\w* are not plucked \w away|strong="H5423"\w*.

\w Reprobate|strong="H3988"\w* \w silver|strong="H3701"\w* shall \add men\add* \w call|strong="H7121"\w* them, because the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* hath \w rejected|strong="H3988"\w* them.\f + \fr 6.30 \ft Reprobate…: or, Refuse silver\f*
